personal.name: Ba Thong Huynh
personal.title: Blockchain Developer
personal.summary: Architecting cutting-edge blockchain solutions using Ethereum, Hyperledger, and Web3 technologies. Specializing in developing secure smart contracts and building scalable decentralized applications that solve real-world problems. Leveraging full-stack expertise to create seamless blockchain integrations that drive business innovation. Committed to advancing distributed ledger technology through robust, performance-optimized implementations.

experience.title: Blockchain Developer
description: Developed and tested blockchain-based applications on Ethereum and Hyperledger platforms
Designed smart contracts and built decentralized applications (dApps) for enterprise systems
Utilized Solidity, Web3.js, and various blockchain frameworks to implement solutions
Participated in technical training to enhance understanding of blockchain architecture and cryptography

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
description: Designed and deployed scalable microservices architectures, improving application performance by 30%
Collaborated with cross-functional team to deliver critical features for SaaS platform ahead of schedule
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment time by 40%
Optimized database queries and APIs, cutting response times by 25%

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
description: Developed full-stack applications using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, increasing user engagement by 15%
Migrated legacy systems to AWS cloud infrastructure, improving scalability by 20%
Created RESTful APIs for integration with third-party platforms, enhancing system interoperability
Collaborated with product managers to design and implement new features

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology
description: Focus on programming, algorithms, and software engineering
Participated in coding competitions and hackathons
